result.title: Report on technical requirements and specifications for AI-enabled perception and sensors fusion systems and platforms and the definition of SC6 use cases

result.title: Measurement result report of the Use case 2
result.description: The report will include the test results for 24 hour multi-usage of the vehicle in real life at Helsinki capital area (use case 2). The report presents the benefits of the multipurpose usage of an L7 category vehicle, the functionality of the charging features of the vehicle, and the evaluation of the the vehicle performance close to its technical limits. The measurement results are used for validating the models and methods used and for promoting our concept.This deliverable refers to T6.4.
